Class Main

java.lang.Object
Main
public class Main extends Object
This class creates and manitpulates space objects in such way that solar system is modeled.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments.

    • createBelt

      public static Moon[] createBelt(SolarSystem s, SpaceObject centrum, int asteroidNumber, double beltDistance, double[] distanceRange, double[][] angleRanges, double[] velocityRange, double[] sizeRange, String color)
      Create asteroids belt around the centrum space object.
      Parameters:
      s - SolarSystem object
      centrum - Object we create belt around
      asteroidNumber - Number of moons/asteroids in the belt
      beltDistance - Average distance from centrum object to belt
      distanceRange - Array to represent limits of asteroids range of distance.
      angleRanges - Array to represent limits of asteroids range of angle.
      velocityRange - Array to represent limits of asteroids range of velocity.
      sizeRange - Array to represent limits of asteroids range of size.
      color - color of the moons/asteroids
      Returns:
      Array of Moon objects that represents belt.

    • partitionSpaceObjectsOnThreads

      public static Thread[] partitionSpaceObjectsOnThreads(SpaceObject[] objects, int threadNumber, int objectNumberPerThread)
      Partition array of space objects between different threads.
      Parameters:
      objects - array of objects to partition
      threadNumber - number of threads to partition on
      objectNumberPerThread - number of objects per each thread
      Returns:
      array of runnable threads
